skills.name: Created an IVR system with a web front-end.
skills.description:
Using Asterix on Linux, created a system for a client that was used to track contractors. They would call in from the work location and left a voicemail checking in then cheking out.
On the back-end, the client could see how long someone worked, who they were working for, and business costs associated

skills.name: Set up and maintained networks for business clients of between 10 and 50 employees
Kept detailed records of all work done in a central ticket-based system
Met with clients to understand thier needs and resolve any issues
